title: Junior 1 bedroom unit with private entrance - all new! Video Tour
app_fee: $40 non refundable application fee for credit check and processing.  Thank you.
posting_body: E 18TH ST in the Ivy Hill neighborhood
Perfect for those moving in the next 30 days or less.
Seeking well qualified applicants to join a friendly tenant community with an on site landlord.
– Sufficient verifiable income required (at least 3 x rent after current debt obligations)
– Good clean credit required (no late payments, judgements, liens, charge offs, derogatory items/public records)
– Good verifiable rental history (from at least two separate landlords)
This nicely updated junior one bedroom apartment, located on the ground floor with a private entrance.
Great location with easy access to like Lake Merrit, grocery stores, markets, restaurants & MORE!
This stylish unit includes an updated kitchen with stainless steel refrigerator and NEW gas stove with lovely wood cabinets.
- One indoor cat negotiable, $300 additional deposit required
- One car parking available, $100/month, in the shared gated lot behind the building
- Internet/cable options are with AT&T or Comcast
Sheri Castilyn – Leasing Agent for Owner License # 01349629 / Broker Associate Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117.
